item.title: My job market experience
item.description: I was on the job market this last year and ended up with a faculty job. I think it’s worth sharing aspects of my process, so maybe someone learns something from it. Prior to entering the job market, I decided two things. I would not be a postdoc unless it was a postdoc to faculty position: I have moved around for school since age 10 when I went to boarding school.
